IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurpose: HEALTH HEALING AND HOPE (HHH) IS A 501 (C) (3) NON PROFIT ORGANIZATION ORIGINALLY ESTABLISHED AS A MEDICAL RESEARCH STUDY TO RESTORE HEALTH, HEALING AND HOPE TO THOSE BATTLING WITH LYME DISEASE. IN 2008 THE MISSION HAS BEEN BROADENED TO EMBRACE FAMILIES STRUGGLING WITH CRITICAL ILLNESS. WE ARE DEDICATED TO MAKING A DIFFERENCVE IN PEOPLE'S LIVES. WE BELIEVE IN OUR BODIES AMAZING ABILITY TO HEAL AND ARE COMMITTED TO PROVIDING THE PERFECT ENVIROMENT FOR OUR SPIRIT, SOUL AND BODY TO HEAL, RESTORE AND RENEW. THE CARING CABIN, HAS BEERN UTILIZED FOR FAMILIES TO MAKE FOREVER MEMORIES, AND SPEND QUIET TIME TOGETHER IN A PLACE OF HARMONY AND PEACE. THE CABIN HAS BEEN ESTABLISHED WITH ONE PURPOSE3 IN MIND, THAT PURPOSE, OUR MISSION, IS TO BRING COMFORT, JOY AND HOPE TO EVERY FAMILY VISITING, ENABLING THEM TO RENEW THEIR SPIRTS MENTALLY AND PHYSICALLY AND PROVIDE "STRENGTH" FOR THEIR JOURNEY.
